home.title: Cincinnati
home.blurb: Following 4 years in NYC, and 1 in Dayton, OH, I am now in Cincinnati. I wish I were closer to hiking areas to see a bit more nature, but maybe that'll be for the next move…!

book.title: L'Anomalie
book.blurb: A friend recommended this award-winning book, an after my Secret Santa at work got it for me — thanks! —, I've been reading it little by little (in French!). So far, pretty happy with how it's going!

game.title: GTA: Vice City
game.blurb: I saw sale after sale on the GTA Trilogy — Definitive Edition, and despite many reports of it being pretty broken, nostalgia got the best of me. I beat GTA3 and I am now onto reliving the '80s in Vice City. Definitely a defining game for me and my love of retro aesthetics!

show.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
show.blurb: I stopped in the middle of season 6 some time in 2018, and I've elected to finally watch the rest of it. A couple of episodes here and there is a perfect non-rhythm for me to enjoy!

music.title: The Dark Pool
music.blurb: I stumbled upon this band via YouTube and have been a little obsessed since. The track named "Lily & the Moon" is probably my favourite of the album.

music.title: Zeit
music.blurb: I've been listening to Rammstein since my teen years and it's a delight that they keep releasing stuff. Just like the previous self-titled one, this album has a lot of good tracks so I can't nail it down to one favourite!
